src:
Jadwal Premier League Hari Ini, Sabtu 2 November 2019
02 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Premier League akan menggelar pertandingan pekan ke-11. Salah satu tim besar yang akan bertanding hari ini adalah Manchester United.
MU pada pekan 11 ini akan menghadapi Bournemouth di Vitality Stadium, Dorsen, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Di laga ini, tim asuhan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer tersebut mengincar kemenangan tandang di Liga Inggris secara beruntun. Sebelumnya, MU menang 3-1 atas Norwich City.
Hanya saja, Setan Merah dipersulit dengan masalah recovery. Pasalnya MU baru saja menang atas Chelsea di Stamford Bridge dalam ajang Carabao Cup tengah pekan ini.
Sedangkan Bournemouth masih dalam masa sulit. Dalam empat pertandingan terakhir di Premier League, Bournemouth mencatatkan tiga kemenangan dan menelan satu kekalahan.
Sementara itu pemuncak klasemen Premier League Liverpool akan di uji oleh tuan rumah Aston Villa. Sedangkan Manchester City bertemu Southampton.
Simak jadwal siaran langsung Premier League di halaman berikutnya, satu laga disiarkan TVRI:
text:
Today's Premier League Schedule, Saturday 2 November 2019
02 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Premier League will hold its 11th match. One of the big teams that will compete today is Manchester United.
MU in this 11th week will face Bournemouth at Vitality Stadium, Dorsen, Saturday (11/02/2019). In this match, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's team is aiming for a win in the Premier League in a row. Previously, Manchester United won 3-1 over Norwich City.
However, the Red Devils are complicated by recovery problems. Because MU has just won over Chelsea at Stamford Bridge in the Carabao Cup midweek event.
While Bournemouth is still in a difficult time. In the last four matches in the Premier League, Bournemouth recorded three wins and swallowed one defeat.
Meanwhile, the top of the Premier League standings Liverpool will be tested by host Aston Villa. Whereas Manchester City meet Southampton.
Check out the Premier League live broadcast schedule on the next page, one match is broadcast on TVRI:
